select.if:
select m.NEWIDX as "x",m.NEWIDY as "y",ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/#{numPercent}) as "userCount",d.stadium_no as "region" from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor') and d.statistics_time=#{maxDate} and ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/#{numPercent}) > 0 and d.stadium_no in
#{region}

select m.NEWIDX as "x",m.NEWIDY as "y",ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/d.USER_RATIO) as "userCount",d.stadium_no as "region" from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor') and d.statistics_time=#{maxDate} and ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/d.USER_RATIO) > 0 and d.stadium_no in
#{region}

select m.NEWIDX as "x",m.NEWIDY as "y",ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/#{numPercent}) as "userCount",d.stadium_no as "region" from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.stadium_no=#{region} and d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor') and d.statistics_time=#{dateStr} and ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/#{numPercent}) >0

select m.NEWIDX as "x",m.NEWIDY as "y",ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/d.USER_RATIO) as "userCount",d.stadium_no as "region" from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.stadium_no=#{region} and d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor') and d.statistics_time=#{dateStr} and ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/d.USER_RATIO) >0

select m.NEWIDX as "x",m.NEWIDY as "y",ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/#{numPercent}) as "userCount" from HI_LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.stadium_no=#{region} and d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor') and d.statistics_time=#{dateStr} and ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/#{numPercent}) >0

select m.NEWIDX as "x",m.NEWIDY as "y",ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/d.USER_RATIO) as "userCount" from HI_LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.stadium_no=#{region} and d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor') and d.statistics_time=#{dateStr} and ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/d.USER_RATIO) >0

select nvl(sum(ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/#{numPercent})),0) from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.stadium_no=#{region} and d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor') and d.statistics_time=#{dateStr}

select nvl(sum(ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/d.USER_RATIO)),0) from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.stadium_no=#{region} and d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor') and d.statistics_time=#{dateStr}

select nvl(sum(ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/#{numPercent})),0) from HI_LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.stadium_no=#{region} and d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor') and d.statistics_time=#{dateStr}

select nvl(sum(ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/d.USER_RATIO)),0) from HI_LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.stadium_no=#{region} and d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor') and d.statistics_time=#{dateStr}

select m.NEWIDX as "x",m.NEWIDY as "y",ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/#{numPercent}) as "userCount",d.stadium_no as "region" ,d.statistics_time as "times" from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.stadium_no=#{region} and d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor') and d.statistics_time=#{maxDate} and ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/#{numPercent}) > #{warnNum} order by d.stadium_no desc

select m.NEWIDX as "x",m.NEWIDY as "y",ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/d.USER_RATIO) as "userCount",d.stadium_no as "region" ,d.statistics_time as "times" from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.stadium_no=#{region} and d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor') and d.statistics_time=#{maxDate} and ceil(d.IMEI_NUM/d.USER_RATIO) > #{warnNum} order by d.stadium_no desc

mapper.select: select d.stadium_no as "region",nvl(sum(d.total_user_num),0) as "userCount" from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d where d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor') group by d.stadium_no
select max(d.statistics_time) from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d where d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor')
select to_char(to_date((select max(statistics_time) from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM),'yyyyMMddHH24miss')-numtodsinterval(4,'hour'),'yyyyMMddHH24miss') from dual
select min(d.statistics_time) from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d where d.area_type in ('Indoor','Outdoor')
mapper.insert: insert into LTE_GRID_USER_NUM(statistics_time,area_type,stadium_no,gridx,gridy,longitude,latitude,imei_num,user_ratio,total_user_num,floor_no) select statistics_time,area_type,stadium_no,gridx,gridy,longitude,latitude,imei_num,user_ratio,total_user_num,floor_no from Test_zwc where statistics_time = #{beforeDate}
